Summary: Follow up to "Star like object changing colors to blue, green and red" in PA.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Oshkosh
There were no other sightings in Oshkosh on or around February 15th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi too have noticed this star like object several times in the past and have photographed it with a canon eos10d on a tripod back in early 2009 but have never reported it because i pointed it out to a few people and got the typical response... well you know. so after seeing the report from pa i thought i would just put it out there to see what happens. i too was seeing the red, blue, and green colors and was photographing it in a high speed sequence when i noticed it seemed to have a repeating pattern to it. then something really bizzare happend, it blinked off for a split second then started over again. i put together a short video comprised of several still photo's in the natural order they occoured from that night and it runs in about 1\4 real time. in addition the last 2 photos are of the object when it appeared to blink off but the camera caught something very strange looking that i couldn't see with the naked eye. i remember thinking to myself at the time, silly seti; don't you think an advanced civilization would communicate using something like light and primary colors other than radio waves?
